phase_1_keypoints.description: Extracted key points from the paper including problem statement, proposed solution, technical approach, constraints, experimental setup, results, and critical dimensions

phase_2_methodology.description: Extracted detailed methodology including problem formulation, memory footprint estimation, partitioning algorithms, deployment strategy, and edge case handling

phase_3_experiments.description: Extracted experimental setup, model configuration, baseline comparison, results analysis, and key findings

condensed_paper.description: Final condensed version of the paper retaining original abstract and all key sections with essential information for deployment

deployment_configuration.description: Complete JSON deployment configuration for both baseline (TP=8, PP=2) and proposed layer-wise methods with detailed GPU mappings, memory allocations, and parallel strategies

task_requirements_met.understanding: Complete understanding of all paper sections achieved through systematic extraction
task_requirements_met.simplification: Unnecessary parts removed while retaining critical information
task_requirements_met.keypoints: All key points retained including dimensions, constraints, and deployment requirements
task_requirements_met.deployment_config: Complete deployment configuration with explicit parameters and device mappings
task_requirements_met.dag_generation: Sufficient information retained for directed acyclic graph generation
task_requirements_met.completeness: All required files generated with no omissions
